mean_cn: n. 时事通讯，业务通讯
mean_en: a short written report that tells about the recent activities of an organization and that is sent to members of the organization
word_etyma: news新闻 + letter信 → newsletter 时事通讯
sentence: From our newsletter, you can learn about how to take good care of your pets.
sentence_trans: 从我们的时事简讯中，你能学会如何照顾好你的宠物。
